roleset.name: increasing in size of an organ or tissue
roleset.note: HYPERTROPHY-V NOTES: Based on medical QA corpus. (Framed by Anwen 07/19/10) (from hypertrophy.01-v predicate notes)
HYPERTROPHIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8(from hypertrophic.01-j)

example.name: hypertrophy-v
example.text: The patient suffered from hypertrophied nasal turbinates.

example.name: hypertrophic-j: arg1
example.text: endomyocardium is hypertrophic with asymmetrical severe septal thickening ;
